### INSTALL ###
DKINSTALL(${DKONLINE}/Libs/leptonica-1.74.4.zip leptonica-1.74.4)
DKSET(LEPTONICA ${3RDPARTY}/leptonica-1.74.4)


### LINK ###
DKINCLUDE(${LEPTONICA}/include)
WIN_DEBUG_LIB(${LEPTONICA}/${OS}/src/Debug/leptonica-1.74.4d.lib)
WIN_RELEASE_LIB(${LEPTONICA}/${OS}/src/Release/leptonica-1.74.4.lib)
APPLE_DEBUG_LIB(${LEPTONICA}/${OS}/lib/${DEBUG}/libtesseract.a)
APPLE_RELEASE_LIB(${LEPTONICA}/${OS}/lib/${RELEASE}/libtesseract.a)
LINUX_DEBUG_LIB(${LEPTONICA}/${OS}/Debug/lib/libtesseract.a)
LINUX_RELEASE_LIB(${LEPTONICA}/${OS}/Release/lib/libtesseract.a)
ANDROID_DEBUG_LIB(${LEPTONICA}/${OS}/Debug/obj/local/armeabi-v7a/libtesseract.a)
ANDROID_RELEASE_LIB(${LEPTONICA}/${OS}/Release/obj/local/armeabi-v7a/libtesseract.a)


### COMPILE ###
DKSETPATH(${LEPTONICA}/${OS})
WIN32_COMMAND(${CMAKE_COMMAND} -G ${GENERATOR} "-DCMAKE_C_FLAGS=/DWIN32 /D_WINDOWS /W3 /nologo" "-DCMAKE_C_FLAGS_DEBUG=/MTd /Od /Ob0 /Zi /RTC1 /DDEBUG /D_DEBUG" "-DCMAKE_C_FLAGS_RELEASE=/MT /O2 /Ob2 /DNDEBUG" -DSTATIC=ON ${LEPTONICA})
WIN32_VS_DEBUG(leptonica-1.74.4 LEPTONICA.sln leptonica)
WIN32_VS_RELEASE(leptonica-1.74.4 LEPTONICA.sln leptonica)
